name: Infinite - Nothing
description:
With thanks(/apologies) to Blaise Pascal/LaMDA/the machine lifeforms in Nier:Automata/Quentin Meillassoux/panel 15 of Homestuck/Carl Rogers/Darius Kazemi for helping me fix my setInterval functions/everyone who's had conversations with me about empathy and consciousness, recently.

This is really a misuse of Bitsy, but I wanted to see if I could get away with using it for (slightly) interactive text display. 

It will randomly corrupt itself at runtime, thanks to a helpful script from bitsy-hacks. This will look a little different each time, but shouldn't affect readability. It seemed fitting to give the zeroes and ones their own creative outlet.

Press down on your keyboard, or swipe down on your touchscreen, to progress. You may need to click or tap on the computer first if it isn't responding.
